    • createGame

      public MatchController createGame(int playerID, int numberOfPlayers, String nickname) throws InvalidNumOfPlayersException, InvalidPlayerStateException
      Creates a new match in the game model
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the host player
      numberOfPlayers - Maximum number of players in the match
      nickname - Nickname of the host player
      Throws:
      InvalidNumOfPlayersException - If the number of players is not between 2 and 4
      InvalidPlayerStateException

    • selectMatch

      public MatchController selectMatch(int playerID, int matchID) throws InvalidMatchIDException, GameIsFullException
      Allows a player to occupy a slot in a match without a nickname The player will be marked as "ready" only after choosing a nickname
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player
      matchID - ID of the match
      Throws:
      InvalidMatchIDException - If the match ID is invalid
      GameIsFullException

    • chooseNickname

      public void chooseNickname(int playerID, String nickname) throws InvalidMatchIDException, NicknameAlreadyExistsException
      Allows a player to choose a nickname for a match and marks the player as "ready"
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player
      nickname - Nickname of the player
      Throws:
      InvalidMatchIDException - If the match ID doesn't exists
      NicknameAlreadyExistsException - If the nickname is already taken by another player in the same match

    • reconnectToMatch

      public int reconnectToMatch(int playerID, String nickname, int matchID) throws InvalidMatchIDException, SpecifiedPlayerNotDisconnected, NicknameNotInMatch
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player
      nickname - Nickname of the player
      matchID - ID of the match
      Returns:
      Old ID of the player in the match
      Throws:
      InvalidMatchIDException - If the match ID doesn't exists
      SpecifiedPlayerNotDisconnected - If the player is not disconnected
      NicknameNotInMatch - If the nickname is not in the match
